kalao.utils.database.get_db(client, dt)#
kalao.utils.database.get_latest_record(collection_name, key=None, no_id=True)#

Searches for the last record in the database for a certain collection

Parameters:

  • collection_name – the collection to search in ‘obs_log’, ‘monitoring_log’, ‘telemetry_log’

  • key – optional key to search for the last record of a specific key

Returns:

last record

kalao.utils.file_handling module#

file_handling.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.utils.file_handling.add_comment(image_path, comment_string)#
kalao.utils.file_handling.create_night_filepath(tmp_night_folder=None)#

Creates a full filepath including filename. If the destination folder does not exist it is created.

Returns:

the generated filepath

kalao.utils.file_handling.create_night_folder()#
kalao.utils.file_handling.read_header_cards(header_config, items_name)#
kalao.utils.file_handling.save_tmp_image(image_path, sequencer_arguments=None)#

Updates the temporary image header and saves into the archive.

Parameters:

  • image_path –

  • sequencer_arguments – argument list received by the sequencer

Returns:

kalao.utils.file_handling.update_default_header_keydict(default_cards, header_keydict)#
kalao.utils.file_handling.update_header(image_path, sequencer_arguments=None)#

Updates the image header with values from the observing, monitoring, and telemetry logs.

Parameters:

  • image_path – path to the image to update

  • sequencer_arguments – argumetns received by the sequencer

Returns:

kalao.utils.kalao_time module#

@author: Nathanaël Restori

kalao.utils.kalao_time.check_time_format(dt)#

Verify that datetime format is correct. Return the dt object if it is correct.

Parameters:

dt – datetime object to verify

Returns:

dt object

kalao.utils.kalao_time.datetime_is_naive(d)#
kalao.utils.kalao_time.get_isotime(now_time=None)#

Takes an datetime object or otherwise the current UTC time and returns a string in ISO 8601 format format such as YYYY-MM-DDTHH.MM.SS.mmm = %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S[.fff] leaving out the UTC offset information.

Parameters:

now_time – datetime object

Returns:

datetime string in iso format

kalao.utils.kalao_time.get_mjd(dt)#
kalao.utils.kalao_time.get_start_of_night(dt=None)#
kalao.utils.kalao_time.now()#

Gets the current UTC time as a timezone aware datetime object

Returns:

datetime object

Module contents#

__init__.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).
